messages.content: A really interesting event, I think it just has way too much impact
You can get an energy relic from this. That is too much.
you can also get extra cursed bell from this
i feel like this discussion already happened or something
which can be too much or too little
the variance between bell and key is too much tbh
There has never been a time where I was happy with bell when I got it
nor a time where I would want bell over key
pretty much just if you have omamori bell is ok
ok I guess high roll is very unlikely
Well even then you still will get those relics, just from later chests/elites
It's not like it materializes the relics. If you get shitty relics, you would've gotten those 3 relics from the next 3 placed you could've.
So even with a high roll, it's still with a grain of salt
it does give you them earlier though, which can boost your strength enough to take more fights and get even stronger
that's why I like the boss option so much. either way you're very likely to get accelerated forward by quite a bit
two curses of the bell are annoying as hell though
key is definitely way stronger tho
that said, it is still a good option
I like left box.
there are some left box enjoyers in the server
Of course, I'm heavily biased as someone who thinks haunted is one of the best curses and as a curse build enjoyer du-vu doll will have so much value over time so often
who likes no box
that said, the other half of the gamba being periapt is ass but that's versus fucking du vu doll
no box good if you have highly specific draws
if a Clumsy would matter to you, two Haunted or soulbound injuries definitely will
that said, I just don't build like that
the worst Blue Candle does is nothing, after all
with neow curses? blue candle is worse than useless as it chips you for clearing haunted, flawed and bewilderment
clearing aged is nice but there's definitly room for blue candle to backfire
you don't have to take the blue candle
to leave from the first option you do (unless you already have it)
Extra cursed key my beloved

as in:
you can click chase away, then then the blue candle shows up you can skip it
Fuck you extra cyrse bing bong
It's sad that I would do this sometimes.
I don't see how <medical kit> and <blue candle> are the same rarity.

embeds.title: Medical Kit
embeds.description:
Shop Relic / All / Slay the Spire

**Unplayable** **Status** cards can now be played. Whenever you play a **Status** card, **Exhaust** it.
*"Has everything you need! Anti-itch, anti-burn, anti-venom, and more!"*

embeds.title: Blue Candle
embeds.description:
Uncommon Relic / All / Slay the Spire

**Unplayable** **Curse** cards can now be played.
Whenever you play a **Curse**, lose 1 HP and **Exhaust** it.
*The flame ignites when shrouded in darkness.*

messages.content: oh wait shit they aren't
Ngl
This event might be a bit op because yknow, energy relic
And even the double curse downside doesnt matter too much since you can just not open chests
medkit on IC is nasty. You proc fire breathing you proc evolve draw, then you exhaust it for free and proc exhaust powers and relics (charon's ashes, FNP, dark embrace)
Yeah it's for this reason that taking cursed key and extra cursed key together so damn good
With ECK CK is basically a free energy relic
Whereas with extra bell, it has negative synergy with normal bell just because so much of your deck is unremovable curses
medkit on IC and Auto is sicko mode

wait
do Extra Cursed Key and Cursed Key stack?
like if you have both of them, do you get 3 curses for opening a chest?
Wait
With boss swap
+ ekc
+ 3 energy relics
Is it possible to have8 energy per turn
Yeah ig, not sure how you'd spend it but it is possible
I don't see why they wouldn't
<whirlwind>

embeds.title: Whirlwind
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / X :e_red: / The Ironclad / Slay the Spire

Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies X times.

messages.content: im pretty sure it gives it to you automatically
Fun fact or more like unfun fact I guess if you have extra cursed key you cannot obtain cursed key
As in it will not show up in the boss reward chest
Oh
so the problem of "would extra cursed key and cursed key downsides stack" is rendered moot
does it work the other way around though?
You could boss-swap into cursed key first
probably not
That's a little lame but I get why
Wait why is bell bad vs key? Key gives potentially a dozen curses but bell only gives 2
back in ye olde days (april, this year) extra cursed key only gave curses when opening chests just like normal cursed key
Now it also gives curses on opening a boss chest, making it so much worse. Now neither option is close to good.
But as for before, I would consider trading an energy relic for just skipping the chests a worthy trade
